parameters.name: BillingDate
parameters.description: The billing date. This parameter is required only if the **Granularity** parameter is set to DAILY. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: Granularity
parameters.description:
The granularity at which bills are queried. Valid values:

*   MONTHLY: queries bills by month. The data queried is consistent with the data that is displayed for the specified billing cycle on the Billing Details tab of the Bill Details page in User Center.
*   DAILY: queries bills by day. The data queried is consistent with the data that is displayed for the specified day on the Billing Details tab of the Bill Details page in User Center.

You must set the **BillingDate** parameter before you can set the Granularity parameter to DAILY.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

parameters.name: ServiceInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service instance.
